staff.title: Staff & Permissions
staff.description: Manage team members and access rights

descriptions.businessInformation: Your business details used across all stores
descriptions.languageSettings: The primary language for your menus and customer-facing content
descriptions.regionalSettings: Timezone and currency settings for this store
descriptions.openingHours: Set your store's opening hours for each day of the week. You can add multiple time slots per day for lunch breaks.
descriptions.closures: Set dates when your store will be closed (holidays, vacations, etc.)
descriptions.storeDetails: Basic information about this store location
descriptions.contactSettings: How customers can reach this store

confirmations.deleteClosure: Are you sure you want to delete this scheduled closure? This action cannot be undone.

emptyStates.noClosures: No scheduled closures. Add one to set vacation days or holidays.

hints.languageOrder: First language is the primary language

subscription.currentPlanDescription: Your current subscription plan and billing status
subscription.noSubscription: You don't have an active subscription. Select a plan below to get started.

trialEnding.title: Trial Ending Soon
trialEnding.description: Your trial ends on {{date}}. Add a payment method to continue using all features.

pastDue.title: Payment Failed
pastDue.description: Your last payment failed. Please update your payment method to avoid service interruption.

paused.title: Subscription Paused
paused.description: Your subscription is paused because no payment method is on file. Add a payment method to resume.

canceling.title: Cancellation Scheduled
canceling.description: Your subscription will be canceled on {{date}}. You can resume anytime before then.

changePlan.title: Change Plan
changePlan.description: Upgrade or downgrade your subscription plan
changePlan.notAvailable: Plan changes are not available with your current subscription status

confirm.upgradeDescription: You are upgrading from {{from}} to {{to}}. You will be charged the prorated difference immediately.
confirm.downgradeDescription: You are downgrading from {{from}} to {{to}}. The change will take effect at the end of your current billing period.

cancel.title: Cancel Subscription
cancel.description: Are you sure you want to cancel your subscription? You will lose access to premium features.
cancel.immediatelyWarning: Warning: Immediate cancellation will end your access today. No refunds will be provided.

payments.pageDescription: Set up your payment account to receive payments from customers

setup.title: Set Up Payment Account
setup.description: To accept payments and receive payouts, you need to connect your payment account.

benefits.trial: 30-day free trial â€” no credit card required
benefits.payouts: Receive payouts to your bank account

status.title: Payment Account Status
status.description: Your payment account connection and capabilities

onboarding.title: Complete Your Account Setup
onboarding.description: To receive payouts and accept live payments, you need to complete your Stripe account verification.

identity.title: Identity Verification
identity.description: Verify your identity with a government-issued ID

banking.title: Bank Account
banking.description: Add your bank account details to receive payouts

business.title: Business Details
business.description: Provide business information for tax purposes

onboarding.skipNote: You can complete this later, but you won't receive payouts until done.

requirementsDue.title: Action Required
requirementsDue.description: Complete your account requirements to continue accepting payments.

requirementsPastDue.title: Urgent Action Required
requirementsPastDue.description: Your requirements are overdue. Payouts may be paused until completed.
